amendment.description: Amendment strikes the authorization for several research and development activities of the FAA that were authorized by H.R. 1000, the Aviation and Investment and Reform Act for the 21st Century.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the authorization of several research and development activities of the FAA that were authorized by H.R. 1000, the Aviation and Investment and Reform Act for the 21st Century.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
